mapper.select: SELECT ep.exp_no ,ep.loginID ,ui.name ,dp.dept_name ,ep.acc_no ,ep.dac_no ,ep.exp_date ,ep.exp_sdate ,ep.dept_cd ,ep.exp_snm ,exp_cost ,exp_bo ,exp_stat ,exp_rere ,exp_pdate ,at.att_nli ,at.att_mul ,at.att_ori ,at.att_ori ,at.att_no ,ep.exp_cont FROM tb_expend ep LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_attachment at ON at.ref_seq_no = ep.exp_no left outer join tb_userinfo ui on ui.loginID = ep.loginID inner join tb_dept dp on ui.dept_cd = dp.dept_cd WHERE ep.exp_no = #{exp_no}
